SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionText
ActionText is used to report events occurring in the game.
ActionTextSystem
Class to put moving text on the screen to report actions.
AgilityTestNode
On landing, the Player has a choice to start an Agility Test game.
AgilityTestScreen
This screen implements the Agility Test minigame, a test of elementary math skills.
Bike
The Bike allows the player to go to any tile on the map in one move.
Book
 
Config
Contains general configuration information for the game.
DesktopLauncher
 
EndScreen
Screen displayed at the end of a game.
FreezeItem
This Item allows a Player to freeze another Player for a turn
GameBoard
Represents the game board screen.
GameContext
Create a version of the game suitable for unit testing.
GameScreen
Parent class contains attributes and methods common to all gameplay screens.
GameState
Stores all information for a game state

Including the difficulty, player list, which player's turn it currently is, the round number, the map of game board tiles, number of stars, and the available stocks.
GlobalPenaltyNode
When landed on, removes money from ALL players on the board.
HighScoreScreen
High score table displays the top player scores achieved in the game.
InstructorDashboardScreen
Instructor dashboard screen displays metrics to track student progress.
Item
Represents a given Item present in the ShopScreen.
KnowledgeListScreen
Shows all knowledge that the current player has learned based on player's current knowledge level
MainGame
The main class of the game.
MainMenuScreen
The main menu screen.
ManageStudentsScreen
Manage students mode in the instructor dashboard.
MultiDice
 
NewGameScreen
Screen displayed at the beginning of a new game.
Node
Represents a Node on the game board.
NormalNode
 
Observable<T>
Implementation of the Observer Pattern - The Observable can notify all Observers
Observer<T>
Implementation of the Observer Pattern - The Observer can listen to an Observable.
PauseScreen
Screen displayed when the game is paused.
PenaltyNode
 
Player
Represents a player in a particular game state.
PlayerProfile
Represents a player when not on the game board.
ProfileManager
Responsible for managing the database of student profiles and high score tables.
SaveScreen
Screen displayed when loading a saved game state.
SaveSystem
Class used to save and load game states.
Shield
 
ShopScreen
Used to buy Stocks and Items
SoundSystem
Responsible for playing sounds in the game.
StarNode
 
Stock
Holds the logic for simulating the stock market fluctuation.
TestGame
Just a dummy ApplicationListener to instantiate LibGDX with.
TutorialScreen
Screen that provides detailed instructions on how to play the game.
Utility
Various utility functions used throughout the program
